subject: Re: For Rees - Crystal Enhancer
author: psfponies
full_text:
Hi Margaret and Rees

I have bought crystals from metaphysical stores, rock shops, ebay etc. 
I got some via the slow boat from china too! The prices vary so much 
depending on where you buy them and what kind of crystal they are. 

Like you said Margaret just look and see which one your drawn too. 

Kay
